医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
他汀类药物被发现可通过抑制白细胞介素 33 来预防慢性炎症相关癌症他汀类药物通过抑制白介素 33 (IL-33) 发挥作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240603/Statins-found-to-prevent-chronic-inflammation-lated-cancers-by-inhibiting-interleukin-33.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240603/Statins-found-to-prevent-chronic-inflammation-lated-cancers-by-inhibiting-interleukin-33.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2cc2356c-aeec-4642-a5d0-2b80320c630b Mon, 03 Jun 2024 05:45:00 -0400 Statins found to prevent chronic inflammation-related cancers by inhibiting interleukin-33
Canagliflozin 增强衰老细胞清除率，改善衰老相关疾病钠-葡萄糖协同转运蛋白 2 (SGLT2) 抑制剂是否会诱导衰老。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240603/Canagliflozin-enhances-senescent-cell-clearance-improving-aging-lated-conditions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240603/Canagliflozin-enhances-senescent-cell-clearance-improving-aging-lated-conditions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d8808b67-dfae-4043-81f4-fafbd3e58649 Mon, 03 Jun 2024 05:13:00 -0400 Canagliflozin enhances senescent cell clearance, improving aging-related conditions
荟萃分析显示，吃蔬菜和水果可显着降低肌肉减少症的风险蔬菜和水果消费与肌肉减少症风险之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240603/Eating-vegetables-and-fruits-significantly-reduces-sarcopenia-risk-meta-analysis-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240603/Eating-vegetables-and-fruits-significantly-reduces-sarcopenia-risk-meta-analysis-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=67a91f08-58de-4c83-a5fd-18b1204d3c70 Mon, 03 Jun 2024 04:34:00 -0400 Eating vegetables and fruits significantly reduces sarcopenia risk, meta-analysis shows
新的治疗方法可以为乳腺癌患者提供更持久的保护根据 Breast Cancer Now 资助的新研究，通过训练免疫系统识别和消灭残留癌细胞的方式杀死乳腺癌细胞，可以为乳腺癌患者提供更持久的保护。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240603/New-treatment-approach-could-offer-longer-having-protection-to-people-with-breast-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240603/New-treatment-approach-could-offer-longer-having-protection-to-people-with-breast-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=806a9174-d6ab-46dd-a348-283ac523bef8 Mon, 03 Jun 2024 04:04:00 -0400 New treatment approach could offer longer lasting protection to people with breast cancer
新策略针对稀有 B 细胞以有效开发 HIV 疫苗种系靶向表位支架纳米颗粒可引发针对人类免疫缺陷病毒 (HIV) 的罕见广泛中和抗体 (bnAb) 前体。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240603/New-strategy-targets-rare-B-cells-for- effective-HIV-vaccine-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240603/New-strategy-targets-rare-B-cells-for- effective-HIV-vaccine-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3703c696-249b-4421-b129-78121bc86e23 Mon, 03 Jun 2024 04:03:00 -0400 New strategy targets rare B cells for effective HIV vaccine development
科学家确定了儿童罕见的、危及生命的免疫缺陷病的遗传原因科学家们已经确定了基因变化，这些变化可能导致儿童出生后几乎没有抵抗感染的免疫防御能力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240603/Scientists-identify-genic-cause-of-rare-life-throne-immunodeficiency-disorders-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240603/Scientists-identify-genic-cause-of-rare-life-throne-immunodeficiency-disorders-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=670efb19-025a-41d3-b855-2dfb734fa2ec Mon, 03 Jun 2024 04:01:00 -0400 Scientists identify genetic cause of rare, life-threatening immunodeficiency disorders in children
长期摄入咖啡因可能会影响帕金森病的大脑化学物质芬兰图尔库大学和图尔库大学医院领导的一项新的国际研究表明，经常摄入大量咖啡因会影响帕金森病患者的多巴胺功能。在进行诊断性脑多巴胺成像之前摄入咖啡因也可能会影响成像结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240603/Chronic-caffeine-intake-may-impact-brain-chemistry-in-Parkinsons-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240603/Chronic-caffeine-intake-may-impact-brain-chemistry-in-Parkinsons-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=79fecb0b-b138-4c10-8f79-2341c86540ed Mon, 03 Jun 2024 03:59:00 -0400 Chronic caffeine intake may impact brain chemistry in Parkinson's disease
研究人员探索肠道细菌在对抗乳腺癌中的作用在 Breast Cancer Now 的新资助下，研究人员正在研究肠道细菌在乳腺癌中的功能，以及如何利用它来对抗这种疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240603/Researchers-explore-gut-bacterias-role-in-fighting-breast-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240603/Researchers-explore-gut-bacterias-role-in-fighting-breast-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8fcd8a85-46e8-421d-9b1d-48464831d44a Mon, 03 Jun 2024 03:55:00 -0400 Researchers explore gut bacteria's role in fighting breast cancer
科学家找到大脑口吃的根源由芬兰图尔库大学和图尔库大学医院的研究人员领导的一个国际研究小组成功地确定了大脑中口吃的可能根源。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240603/Scientists-locate-the-source-of-stuttering-in-the-brain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240603/Scientists-locate-the-source-of-stuttering-in-the-brain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f0b73dff-3be2-4146-8551-3489a15f544e Mon, 03 Jun 2024 03:52:00 -0400 Scientists locate the source of stuttering in the brain
美国国防部资助澳大利亚帕金森病治疗研究澳大利亚转化研究所 (TRI) 的研究人员获得了美国国防部 (DoD) 的大量资助，用于通过针对肠道微生物组来开发帕金森病 (PD) 治疗方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240603/US-DoD-funds-Australian-research-on-Parkinsons-disease-treatments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240603/US-DoD-funds-Australian-research-on-Parkinsons-disease-treatments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8567ddaf-cea5-4c37-b364-9a41a6e98274 Mon, 03 Jun 2024 03:47:00 -0400 US DoD funds Australian research on Parkinson's disease treatments
